titles.title: To amend the Federal Home Loan Bank Act to provide for the representation of Guam and the Virgin Islands on the boards of directors of the appropriate Federal home loan banks.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Development.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Financial Institutions Supervision, Regulation and Deposit Insurance.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
committee.subcommittee: Financial Institutions Supervision, Regulation and Deposit Insurance

bill.summary: 3/17/1994--Introduced. Amends the Federal Home Loan Bank Act to direct the Federal Housing Finance Board to appoint additional elective directors for Guam and the Virgin Islands to represent bank members located in those Islands until directors representing their interests are elected.
